summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Mood Sync AI-powered mood tracking application. All core features tested successfully including 6-step mood assessment, Claude Sonnet 4 AI guidance generation, history analytics with charts, and music player functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: Stop button has element stability timeout issue

passed_tests: Mood submission with AI guidance generation
Mood history retrieval with proper data structure
Mood trends analysis and chart data
Claude Sonnet 4 AI integration generating personalized guidance
Landing page with nature-inspired design and hero section
Complete 6-step mood assessment flow (emotion selection, sliders, overthinking, notes)
All 7 emotion options (Sad, Anxious, Depressed, Angry, Overwhelmed, Tired, Stressed)
Emotion level, energy level, and focus level sliders (0-10)
Overthinking selection (No, Slightly, A lot, Constantly)
AI guidance display on Guidance page with mood summary
History page with statistics dashboard (avg emotion, energy, focus, total entries)
Trends chart displaying emotional patterns over time with multiple lines
Recent mood entries list with emojis and timestamps
Navigation between all pages (Landing, Assessment, Guidance, History)
Music player play/pause functionality and volume control
Responsive design and proper UI styling
